content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=””][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”remove-margin”][vc_column_text]

Medical Video Cameras

A selection of medical grade C-mount video cameras that we distribute, including Ikegami and Sony. These cameras work with our Accu-Beam® video adapter to capture excellent video from 1080p to 4k resolution. We also carry a range of medical grade video recorders.

The cameras listed are the most popular options chosen by our customers, but we carry every C-mount camera offered by these brands. If you would like to special order a camera you don’t see here simply request a quote.

Sample videos can be found on our YouTube page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”72715″ img_size=”full” add_caption=”yes” onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1444503683289{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e2e2e2″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=”” el_class=”dotted”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” css=”.vc_custom_1569437782001{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72711″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-cameras/ikegami-mkc-x800/” css=”.vc_custom_1574793418903{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581622634126{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Ikegami MKC-X800

The first medical grade video camera with native 4k resolution – ideal for anterior segment. 2160p/1 chip.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72745″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-cameras/sony-mcc-1000md/” css=”.vc_custom_1581365167835{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581622614035{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Sony MCC-1000MD

The highest light sensitivity camera on the market – ideal for retinal surgery. 1080p/3 chip.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72855″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-cameras/ikegami-mkc-210/” css=”.vc_custom_1574811146911{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581622643283{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Ikegami MKC-210

An entry level medical grade camera from Ikegami at a great price – ideal for anterior segment. 1080p/1 chip.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73770″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-cameras/ikegami-mkc-230/” css=”.vc_custom_1588027721526{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1588028836228{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Ikegami MKC-230

A cost-effective option for a high sensitivity medical camera – ideal for retinal surgery. 1080p/3 chip.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”74032″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-cameras/tti-hdr/” css=”.vc_custom_1597338052482{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1597338172291{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

TTI-4K-R

Our most cost-effective camera with built-in 4k recording, HDMI out, and wireless functionality. 2160p/1 chip.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73356″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-cameras/ikegami-mkc-704k/” css=”.vc_custom_1588027417382{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1588027428694{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Ikegami MKC-704k

The best option for those who need both high sensitivity and 4k resolution – ideal for retinal surgery. 2160p/3 chip.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72764″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-cameras/recorders/” css=”.vc_custom_1581365209606{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581622681811{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Medical Recorders

A selection of medical grade video recorders to use with the cameras we carry. Options for 4k and 1080p.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
